item.title: Big Data. Big Cost Savings.
item.description: Increased system performance while saving thousands of hours of operations’ troubleshooting time by implementing Hadoop, Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana for distributed storage and analytics of Verizon’s system logs

item.title: Internet Of Things. Internet Of Opportunity.
item.description: Saved 1,000s of hours of client’s tech development time by streamlining client’s IOT platform development with automated tests. In addition, our resultants leveraged this automation framework to expand client’s IOT offerings to include simulation and 3D visualization of Smart Cities solutions
